document.full_text: environmental groups and the e.p.a. have reached a deal requiring tougher regulations for ships that dump ballast water into american harbors, a leading way in which invasive species are spread.
document.title: washington: pact reached on ballast dumping
lines_and_colors: environmental groups and the e.p.a. have reached a deal requiring tougher regulations for ships that dump ballast water into american harbors, a leading way in which invasive species are spread.
